text: Kinds of Kindness is a 2024 American British Irish black comedy anthology movie directed by Yorgos Lanthimos and starring Emma Stone, Willem Dafoe, Jesse Plemons, Margaret Qualley, Hong Chau, Joe Alwyn and Hunter Schafer. It was distributed by Searchlight Pictures. Kinds of Kindness was the first Searchlight movie to be released by Sony Pictures Home Entertainment after the closure of Disney's home video business. ==Other websites== * Category:2020s comedy-drama movies Category:2020s black comedy movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Irish comedy movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New Orleans Category:Movies directed by Yorgos Lanthimos Category:Irish drama movies Category:2020s American drama movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:British black comedy movies
title: Kinds of Kindness
